content: amalgamation beanie by shaina bilow the amalgamation beanie is knit with two strands of worsted weight yarn held together creating a thick warm hat that s perfect for chilly days made from scrap cakes each version becomes a unique amalgamation of colors making it a true one-of-a-kind stash-busting project the pattern is provided in two variations knit flat and seamed or knit seamlessly amount listed accounts for that scrap cakes of various colors and fibers of worsted weight yarns were used in the sample hat to make a scrap cake refer below other materials stitch marker tapestry needle to make a scrap cake 1 gather your worsted weight odd-balls and yarn scraps into an appealing color combination 2 either winding by hand or with a ball-winder begin winding a ball of yarn with one color for desired length note for smaller balls wind up the whole length for larger balls wind up a few yards and then cut 3 attach the next color using a square knot taking care to leave tails long enough to weave in 4 wind the next color for desired length 5 repeat from step 3 until your scrap cake is the desired size or until your yarn has been used up tutorial videos shaina s youtube
